summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAvene Hydrance RICH Hydrating Cream is a creamy moisturizer that quickly absorbs into the skin for intense hydration. Skin is immediately refreshed and more radiant.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreamy moisturizer quickly absorbs for intense hydrationFormulated to minimize risk of allergic reactionsWon't clog poresHelps restore a cohesive skin barrier and prevents water lossRestores and replenishes skin's moisture reservoirs for 24 hours of hydrationSoothes tightness, tingling sensations and discomfort associated with dehydrated skinProvides 24 hour hydration and antioxidant protectionSkin is left soft and supple. Luminosity is restoredKey IngredientsCohederm patented revolutionary technology, backed by science, is the ideal lipidic trio to restore and bind moisture to the skin for enhanced elasticity and comfort while preventing water lossRestores a cohesive skin barrier and replenishes natural micro-reservoirs with Avène Thermal Spring WaterHydration-Boosting Microspheres gradually release Avène Thermal Spring Water and lipids for maximum skin replenishment and time-released hydrationShea Butter moisturizes and nourishesAvène Thermal Spring Water soothes discomfort and tightness from dehydrated skinFormulated WithoutParabenSoyWheatAnimal derived ingredientsItem 2577173How To UseApply morning and/or evening to the face, neck and neckline.IngredientsAvène Thermal Spring Water, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carthamus Tinctoris Seed Oil (Safflower Seed Oil), Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Triethylhexanoin, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, 1,2-Hexandiol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Shea Butter), Cetearyl Glucoside, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance, Phytosterols, Polyacrylate-13, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Hydroxide, Sorbitan Isostearate, Water, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply morning and/or evening to the face, neck and neckline.
ingredients: Carthamus Tinctoris Seed Oil (Safflower Seed Oil)

reviews.headline: My skin is glowing
reviews.comments: I am repurchasing 100%

reviews.headline: Hydrates but broke me out
reviews.comments: Very hydrating however it broke me out quite badly. I think it was the fragrance; it's a rose-powdery scent. If your skin can handle fragrance you may like this product

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This product totally moisturizes my face all day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This face lotion goes on so smoothly and moisturizes my face all day. It leaves my face so soft. Totally love it.

reviews.headline: Miracle Product
reviews.comments: I have rosacea, acne prone, superrrr sensitive skin. Like everything makes my skin freak out. This is a miracle product. It keeps my skin so hydrated (with no breakouts) during these dry winters and summers in utah. Amazing product. I dont see myself switching moisturizer for a long long time. The tube does seem small, but you just need a tiny amount so this tube should last a while.

reviews.headline: Miracle Product
reviews.comments: I have rosacea, acne prone, superrrr sensitive skin. Like everything makes my skin freak out. This is a miracle product. It keeps my skin so hydrated (with no breakouts) during these dry winters and summers in utah. Amazing product. I dont see myself switching moisturizer for a long long time. The tube does seem small, but you just need a tiny amount so this tube should last a while.

reviews.headline: THIS HYDRATES
reviews.comments: I have used numerous high end moisturizers but none have treated my skin as this does. immediately I can feel it working and the hydration is AMAZING. the smell is fabulous

reviews.headline: Heavily scented and not very hydrating.
reviews.comments: Smells like old lady perfume.

reviews.headline: So excited until I realized it had fragrance…
reviews.comments: I love Avene products. Their thermal spring water and cicalfate balm is amazing. However, this has such a strong fragrance I'm afraid I will have a reaction to it.

reviews.headline: I would define but this product again!
reviews.comments: Leave skin supper hydrated.   My face has a nice glow after only using it for a couple days

reviews.headline: FAVORITE
reviews.comments: My favorite moisturizer I've ever used, so hydrating and lasts all day! Will continue to repurchase literally forever.

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: My rosacea-prone/perioral dermatitis prone skin loves this. No irritation, no burning, just soothing happy skin! And I do love the light scent.

reviews.headline: Not the best yet costly.
reviews.comments: Expected to be more of a balm like consistency. Applies well leaves skin soft is all I have to say other than not hydrating. After applying layers to make hydration last my skin still dry if I have been out for a while. Will continue to use on hands only.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin
reviews.comments: I had horribly dry flaky skin, I got a free sample of this product and was blown away by how instantly my skin felt less tight, softer, and hydrated. I'm now on my 3rd bottle and to me the cost is totally worth it. You only need a dime to nickel size amount.

reviews.headline: Found a favorite
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive and dry skin.  This product is amazing .  Feels great on my skin.  Perfect hydration.

reviews.headline: THE BEST
reviews.comments: This is absolutely perfect in every way. It sinks in quick, hydrates, moisturizes, and is perfect under makeup. Forever repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Hydrating yes but the smell
reviews.comments: If you don't like fragrance hard pass. If you don't like the smell of baby powder another pass.

reviews.headline: peels like crazy!
reviews.comments: How all these 5 star reviews on here?!? I bought to replace an $65 facial moisturizer that I loved for a more cost effective brand. After one single use, 10 minutes after applying and laying down for bed, I checked my face and the moisturizer is peeling all over my entire face and bad. I will be returning immediately. There's no way I could apply this in the morning before makeup.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating !
reviews.comments: I love this brand I love the moisturizer. I have combination skin and this helps so much with the dryness during winter !

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I'm in my mid-40s & have tried many different moisturizers.  This is my absolute favorite.  It moisturizes without leaving a greasy feeling/look to your skin and my makeup goes on so much smoother.  I have dry to oily skin.  It keeps my skin hydrated and keeps the oily contained.  My only complaint is I wish the scent was lighter.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: NO break outs on rosacea prone facial skin

display_values: NO break outs on rosacea prone facial skin

faceoff_positive.comments: Alittle over a year ago I began to develop rosacea. The texture of my skin is great, but I have constant redness, painful flushing, and very dry and sensitive skin. Recently my dermatologist prescribed a cream to help combat flushing, but it leaves my skin SO incredibly tight and red, it feels like plaster and is painful to make any facial expression or smile or open my mouth to eat. And dry tight skin = red skin. I have been living horribly. My skin used to be my pride and joy, then I began to never leave the house because of it. And on top of that, whether anyone saw me or not, it was incredibly uncomfortable and painful. I dug out this old cream I used to get from my dermatologist years and years ago when my skin would get occasionally dry and winter. I was desperate for something that could give me some relief so I could see my old face again for the first time in years. And it is a LIFE SAVER. IMMEDIATELY after putting it on my skin felt incredibly flexible and comfortable and the redness has decreased significantly. Normally, touching my face at all causes it to flare up, but putting this on my face was nothing but comfort. This brand has literally given me my life back. I immediately went out and did things with friends because I felt like my old self again. And it is a GREAT feeling. This cream is great for rosacea, dry skin, redness, and sensitivity, all of which I have. I cannot believe the amount of issues it has corrected for me in just one day. If it continues to work like this I will never switch to anything else!
faceoff_positive.headline: RELIEF

faceoff_negative.comments: Five stars for product quality and performance. It has all the qualities I was searching for. It is rich, ultra hydrating, thick and goes on smoothly. The winters are long and drying in New England. I wanted this as my everyday, go-to moisturizer. The moment I opened it and caught wind of the scent was my usual "oh, no...". I absolutely detest the signature scent of AVENE (yet I love the product!). It is strong, it lingers and frequently can be irritating. Why would company that is know for making products for people with sensitive skin use a horrible fragrance? It is a bitter/floral/old-lady cheap perfume scent. Horrible. I could live with a scent which was subtle, did not linger and fresh. Please consider remaking your signature scent.
faceoff_negative.headline: Could have been 5 stars
